{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Echostar |model=Wireless Joey Access Point |asin=B00O361L78 |fcc_date=01/10/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WA8001A |manuf_rev=-AC23 |type=access point |fcc_id=RAXWA8001AAC |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.46 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4706;BCM4706KPBG; |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QF-BCF7 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM5241A1;BCM5241A1KMLG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amp Module;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 333GV, 1333 MY;3; |stock_boot=CFE |802dot11_protocols=an+ac }} '''Echostar Wireless Joey Access Point'''
FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RAXWA8001AAC RAXWA8001AAC] :Model No: WA8001A-AC23
"P/N:141800120003J R0B" is silkscreened on the back of the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2218129 main board]
===See also=== *[[Echostar Wireless Joey Access Point 2]] - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RAXWA8001BAC2 RAXWA8001BAC2] :(2016-02-29) - 4x4 AP - ([[Arcadyan]] WA8001B-AC44 v2) (12V/1.46A) *[[Airsonics GXT542U]] - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RAXWA8001BAC RAXWA8001BAC] (2015-03-31) :4x4 Video bridge - ([[Arcadyan]] WA8001B-AC44) (12V/1.5A) *[[ASUS 4G-N12]] - ([[Arcadyan]] WR7015AL-ASU) [http://www.arcadyan.com/contentPage.aspx?type=product-detail&L2id=7&prod2id=22 PPage] [http://foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/160-asus-4g-n12 FN review] *[[ASUS EA-AC87]] - ([[Arcadyan]] WA5005A-AC44) *[[ASUS RT-AC87U]] - ([[Arcadyan]] WG9117A-AC44)
